    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssetController
    Controller class responsible for handling asset-related operations.
    AssetDB
    Handles saving and retrieving asset data from a JSON file.
    AssetManagementUI
    UI for managing user assets.
    AssetService
    Provides business logic for asset management, including adding, viewing, and removing user assets.
    AuthController
    Controller class responsible for user authentication operations.
    AuthService
    Provides authentication services for login and registration.
    DashboardUI
    Dashboard UI for navigating between different features of the Wealth Wise system.
    Investor
     
    LoginPageUI
    UI for user login using a Swing JFrame.
    Main
    Main class for launching the Wealth Wise application.
    PortfolioDB
    Handles user's asset portfolio management using a JSON file.
    PortfolioDE
     
    PortfolioPageUI
    UI for displaying the user's asset portfolio.
    ReportController
    Controller class responsible for generating reports.
    ReportPanelUI
    UI for generating a financial report for the logged-in user.
    ReportService
    Handles generation of user financial reports.
    SignUpPage
    UI class for user sign-up using a Swing JFrame.
    UserDB
    Manages user registration and authentication using a JSON file.
    ZakatController
    Controller class responsible for Zakat calculations.
    ZakatPanelUI
    UI panel for calculating zakat for a user's assets.
    ZakatService
    Provides logic to calculate zakat based on user assets.
